massmessage-form-subject-help: Waei yɛ bu ani guso sɛ krataafa no fa a yɛ yiyiieɛ sɛ yɛ ɛfa nkɔ sɛ adesuadeɛ.
massmessage-form-page-message-section: Kratafa no fa a ɛsɛ sɛ ɛkɔ sɛ nkratoɔ:
massmessage-form-page-message-section-he: Yi kratafa bi na dinkae hwɛ sɛ nea ne bɔberɛ teɛ wɔ ɔfa dodoɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ no mu.Sɛ yɛyi ɔfa bi a ɛno pɛ na yɛde bɛ kɔ sɛ nkratoɔ.
massmessage-form-page-subject-section: Yɛ bɛtumi ayi krataafa yi mu fa bi de akɔ sɛ adesuadeɛ
massmessage-form-page-subject-section-he: Yiyi krataafa no na dinkae hwɛ ne bɔberɛ na hwɛ twerɛ no baako baako wɔ ɛfa a ɛwɔ hɔ no. Ɛfa a y'ayiyi no pɛ na yɛ de bɛsi hɔ sɛ adesuadeɛ.
massmessage-page-subject-empty: ɛfa "$1" a yɛ yiyii wɔ krataafa "$2" sɛ yɛ ɛnfa nkɔ sɛ asuadeɛ no nni nsɛmfua biara.
